document_data.name: Mercatio
document_data.mainbody: '''Mercatio''' was a minor merchant organization and a noble family from the city of [[Arrabar]] in the [[Vilhon Reach]].
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], [[Adyan Mercatio]] was the scion of House Mercatio. By the {{YearlinkName|1373}}, Adyan Mercatio was the member of the [[Waukeen]]ar mercenary organization â€“ the [[Order of the Sapphire Crescent]], seving alongside two fellow noble scions, [[Vambran Matrell]] of [[House Matrell]] and [[Horial Rohden]] of [[House Rohden]]
